//: ~~ Generated by projen. To modify, edit .projenrc.js and run "npx projen".
name: alf-cdk-ui

scripts.no-changes: (git log --oneline -1 | grep -q "chore(release):") && echo "No changes to release."
scripts.release: yarn run --silent no-changes || (yarn run bump && git push --follow-tags origin master)
scripts.projen:upgrade: yarn upgrade -L projen && CI="" yarn projen
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn install && react-scripts build && yarn run dist:dev && yarn run dist:prod
scripts.dist:dev: mkdir dist-dev && cp -R build/* dist-dev && cp config-dev.js dist-dev/config.js
scripts.dist:prod: mkdir dist-prod && cp -R build/* dist-prod && cp config-prod.js dist-prod/config.js
scripts.cdkdeploy: yarn run build && cd cdk && yarn install && cdk deploy alf-cdk-ui-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88 --require-approval never
scripts.cdksynth: yarn run build && cd cdk && yarn install && cdk synth alf-cdk-ui-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88
scripts.cdkdestroy: yarn run build && cd cdk && yarn install && yes | cdk destroy alf-cdk-ui-${STAGE:-dev} --profile damadden88
scripts.cdkpipelinediff: yarn run build && cd cdk && yarn install && cdk diff alf-cdk-ui-pipeline --profile damadden88 || true
scripts.cdkpipelinedeploy: yarn run build && cd cdk && yarn install && cdk deploy alf-cdk-ui-pipeline --profile damadden88 --require-approval never

bump.desc: Commits a bump to the package version based on conventional commits

projen:upgrade.desc: upgrades projen to the latest version

build.desc: Creates an optimized production build of your React application

eject.desc: Ejects your React application from react-scripts
